analyzed: bhante nāgasena sabbe iva labhanti nibbānanti

original: “Na kho, mahārāja, sabbeva labhanti nibbānaṁ, api ca kho, mahārāja, yo sammā paṭipanno
analyzed: na kho mahā rāja sabbe iva labhanti nibbāna api ca kho mahā rāja yaḥ sammā paṭipannaḥ

original: abhiññeyye dhamme abhijānāti, pariññeyye dhamme parijānāti, pahātabbe dhamme pajahati,
analyzed: abhiññeyye dhamme abhijānāti pariññeyye dhamme parijānāti pahātabbe dhamme pajahati

original: bhāvetabbe dhamme bhāveti, sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikaroti, so labhati nibbānan”ti.
analyzed: bhāvetabbe dhamme bhāveti sacchikātabbe dhamme sacchikaroti so labhati nibbānan ti
